column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Hi Debra O.  Thank you for your review.  Your feedback helps us continue to improve.  Please allow our Managing Partner to reach out to you.  If that would be ok
column2: please private message a phone number or email at your convenience.  We are sorry for your experience as providing sub-par products is not what we are about and making sure we amend this situation is our priority.  Thank you.
